participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for design and music.
participant_1.background: I grew up with my parents and siblings. I keep my hair cut very short. I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms. I have recently started working as a freelance designer. My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.

participant_2.name: Kyle
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a great sense of humor and a love for music.
participant_2.background: I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support. I am an army ranger. I am funny. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since.

content.text: Hi, I am new here, what do you like to do?
Hey there, I like to play music and do a lot of physical activities like hiking and jogging.
Cool, I'm a freelance designer and I enjoy listening to music on my own terms.
That sounds really cool, I love music too! What are your favorite TV shows?
I like medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
Those are great genres! I'm more into comedy myself, but I do love a good medical drama.
Me too, they're so interesting! I'm glad you're a fan of music, I love when people share that interest with me.
Me too! It's always fun to talk about music and find new artists to listen to.
Exactly! I love finding new music to add to my collection.
Me too, I have a huge music collection.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new music to listen to, so if you have any recommendations, I'd love to hear them.
Sure, I'll send you some links later.
